channel.title: golang on Hello, I'm Mark
channel.description: Recent content in golang on Hello, I'm Mark

item.title: Golang Interfaces: How different they are to Java
item.description: Originally I planned to make a new blogpost about the visitor design pattern and wanted to use Golang to show the concept for it. But because of how Golang is organized fundamentally you’ll see that the visitor pattern doesn’t make sense with Go. Playing around with interfaces and trying to jumble together some thoughts via chatting I was able to better understand the big differences between Java and Go interfaces.
